# Quantitative Research Services - Request for Standing Offer

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01031338
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000030656-002
* **Publication Date:** April 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2023, 2PM EST
* **Proponent Must Register Through:** Canada Buys (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Justice Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Kayla Pordonick, kayla.pordonick@justice.gc.ca, 613-301-9709
* **Notice URL:** Not Applicable

## Request Description

The Department of Justice Canada invites qualified Proponents to submit proposals for the provision of quantitative research services related to the following areas:

* Indigenous people in the Canadian Justice System
* Black or Racialized people in the Canadian Justice System
* Social determinants of Justice System involvement in Canada

## Scope of Work

Quantitative research services include:

* Designing and implementing research projects
* Validating and assessing research approaches
* Identifying methodologies
* Developing and testing data collection methods
* Analyzing data using statistical tools (e.g., SPSS, SAS, EViews, Stata, R)
* Analyzing large data sets available at Statistics Canada Research Data Centres
* Employing simulation techniques to predict/project demographic and economic/social outcomes

## Methodology and Evaluation Criteria

A selection committee will evaluate proposals based on the following criteria:

* Proven experience and expertise in the required areas of research
* Proponent's ability to deliver high-quality research services
* Proponent's understanding of the client's requirements
* Proponent's technical and financial capabilities

## Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses

Up to 10 Standing Offers will be awarded to successful Proponents. Each Stand offer will be valid for 1 year from the award date, with two additional option periods of 1 year each.

**Note:** This opportunity is subject to Trade Agreement requirements. Proponents are advised to familiarize themselves with the applicable trade agreements.

To submit a proposal, Proponents must register through Canada Buys and follow the instructions provided in the solicitation documents. For more information, please contact Kayla Pordonick at 613-301-9709 or kayla.pordonick@justice.gc.ca.  [400 word limit reached]
